snippet: Results of clinical trials should be accessible to all scientists.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Harlan M Krumholz praises Johnson & Johnson for deciding to make all of its clinical trial data available to scientists around the world; contends there are many benefits to this kind of sharing and it should be replicated throughout the research world.
